column4: hi there. A silly question but I'm flumoxxed (and new to unbuntu). I want to play streaming real media or streaming windows but can't work out what to do. The site sending the streams is http://www.abc.net.au/rn/philosopherszone/ Most grateful for any assistance. Many thanks.
you have to configure your browser to use vlc for the wmv files. I usually right click to catch the links, then create a playlist with the urls in it
you can also right click on the download audio and listen offline
